ActorNameFormat ActorNameFormat Class

Definition

Namespace:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Actors.Generator
Assembly:
Microsoft.ServiceFabric.Actors.dll

Contains static methods for generating names like service name, application name form the actor interface type.

GetCodePackageName(Type) GetCodePackageName(Type)

Edit

Gets the code package name used in service package for the actor.

public static string GetCodePackageName(Type actorImplementationType = null)Public Shared Function GetCodePackageName(actorImplementationType As Type = Nothing) As String
Parameters
actorImplementationType
Type Type

Type of class implementing the actor.

Returns
String String

code package name.

Remarks

Code package name can be accessed from within a service as CodePackageName

Edit

Gets the application name used to create application in Service Fabric cluster.

Parameters
appPrefix

Parameters
appPrefix

Edit

Gets the application type name used in application manifest when creating Service Fabric Application package for the actor.

Edit

Gets the service endpoint for the actor type which is specified in service manifest for the actor service.

GetFabricServiceName(Type, String) GetFabricServiceName(Type, String)

Edit

Gets name of service which hosts the actor type in Service Fabric cluster.

public static string GetFabricServiceName(Type actorInterfaceType, string serviceName = null)Public Shared Function GetFabricServiceName(actorInterfaceType As Type, serviceName As String = Nothing) As String
Parameters
actorInterfaceType
Type Type

Type of the actor interface.

serviceName
String String

Name of service hosting the actor type. If this value is null then service name is constructed using the actorInterfaceType.

Returns
String String

Service Fabric service name hosting the actor type.

Gets service package name which is used in Service Fabric Application package for the actor.

Parameters

GetFabricServiceReplicatorConfigSectionName(Type) GetFabricServiceReplicatorConfigSectionName(Type)

Edit

Gets the replicator configuration section name specified in configuration package for the actor service.

public static string GetFabricServiceReplicatorConfigSectionName(Type actorImplementationType)Public Shared Function GetFabricServiceReplicatorConfigSectionName(actorImplementationType As Type) As String
Parameters
actorImplementationType
Type Type

Type of class implementing the actor.

Returns
String String

Replicator configuration section name.

Remarks

Values specified in replicator configuration section are used to configure ReplicatorSettings for the replication of actor state between primary and secondary replicas.

Gets the replicator endpoint which is specified in service manifest for the actor service.

Parameters

Returns
String String

Service replicator endpoint name.

GetFabricServiceReplicatorSecurityConfigSectionName(Type) GetFabricServiceReplicatorSecurityConfigSectionName(Type)

Edit

Gets the replicator security configuration section name specified in configuration package for the actor service.

public static string GetFabricServiceReplicatorSecurityConfigSectionName(Type actorImplementationType)Public Shared Function GetFabricServiceReplicatorSecurityConfigSectionName(actorImplementationType As Type) As String
Parameters
actorImplementationType
Type Type

Type of class implementing the actor.

Returns
String String

Replicator security configuration section name.

Remarks

Values specified in replicator security configuration section are used to configure SecurityCredentials for the replication of actor state between primary and secondary replicas.

Edit

Gets the credential type name used in replicator security configuration section in configuration package for the actor service.

Parameters

GetFabricServiceTransportSettingsSectionName(Type) GetFabricServiceTransportSettingsSectionName(Type)

Edit

Gets the fabrictransport configuration section name specified in configuration package for the actor service.

public static string GetFabricServiceTransportSettingsSectionName(Type actorImplementationType)Public Shared Function GetFabricServiceTransportSettingsSectionName(actorImplementationType As Type) As String
Parameters
actorImplementationType
Type Type

Type of class implementing the actor.

Returns
String String

FabricTransport configuration section name.

Remarks

Values specified in FabricTransport configuration section are used to configure FabricTransportListenerSettings for the communication.

GetFabricServiceTypeName(Type) GetFabricServiceTypeName(Type)

Gets service type name for the actor.

Parameters
actorImplementationType

Actor implementation type.

GetFabricServiceUri(Type) GetFabricServiceUri(Type)

Edit

Gets service Uri which hosts the actor type in Service Fabric cluster.

public static Uri GetFabricServiceUri(Type actorInterfaceType)Public Shared Function GetFabricServiceUri(actorInterfaceType As Type) As Uri
Parameters
actorInterfaceType
Type Type

Type of the actor interface.

Returns
Uri Uri

Service Fabric service Uri hosting the actor type.

Exceptions
ArgumentException ArgumentException

When application name cannot be determined using CodePackageActivationContext.

Remarks

Method will try to get application name from CodePackageActivationContext. If the method still cannot determine application name, ArgumentException is thrown.

GetFabricServiceUri(Type, String, String) GetFabricServiceUri(Type, String, String)

Edit

Gets service Uri which hosts the actor type in Service Fabric cluster.

public static Uri GetFabricServiceUri(Type actorInterfaceType, string applicationName = null, string serviceName = null)Public Shared Function GetFabricServiceUri(actorInterfaceType As Type, applicationName As String = Nothing, serviceName As String = Nothing) As Uri
Parameters
actorInterfaceType
Type Type

Type of the actor interface.

applicationName
String String

Service Fabric application name containing the actor service. If this value is null application name is obtained from ApplicationName.

serviceName
String String

Name of service hosting the actor type. If this value is null then service name is constructed using the actorInterfaceType.

Returns
Uri Uri

Service Fabric service Uri hosting the actor type.

Exceptions
ArgumentException ArgumentException

When applicationName cannot be determined using CodePackageActivationContext.

Remarks

If applicationName is passed as null or empty string, an attempt is made to get application name from CodePackageActivationContext. If the method still cannot determine application name, ArgumentException is thrown.

GetFabricServiceUri(Type, Uri) GetFabricServiceUri(Type, Uri)

Edit

Gets service Uri which hosts the actor type in Service Fabric cluster.

public static Uri GetFabricServiceUri(Type actorInterfaceType, Uri applicationUri)Public Shared Function GetFabricServiceUri(actorInterfaceType As Type, applicationUri As Uri) As Uri
Parameters
actorInterfaceType
Type Type

Type of the actor interface.

applicationUri
Uri Uri

Service Fabric application Uri containing the actor service. If this value is null application name is obtained from ApplicationName.

Returns
Uri Uri

Service Fabric service Uri hosting the actor type.

Exceptions
ArgumentException ArgumentException

When application name cannot be determined using CodePackageActivationContext.

Remarks

Method will create service name using the actorInterfaceType. If applicationUri is passed as null, an attempt is made to get application name from CodePackageActivationContext. If the method still cannot determine application name, ArgumentException is thrown.

GetFabricServiceUri(Type, Uri, String) GetFabricServiceUri(Type, Uri, String)

Edit

Gets service Uri which hosts the actor type in Service Fabric cluster.

public static Uri GetFabricServiceUri(Type actorInterfaceType, Uri applicationUri, string serviceName)Public Shared Function GetFabricServiceUri(actorInterfaceType As Type, applicationUri As Uri, serviceName As String) As Uri
Parameters
actorInterfaceType
Type Type

Type of the actor interface.

applicationUri
Uri Uri

Service Fabric application Uri containing the actor service. If this value is null application name is obtained from ApplicationName.

serviceName
String String

Name of service hosting the actor type. If this value is null then service name is constructed using the actorInterfaceType.

Returns
Uri Uri

Service Fabric service Uri hosting the actor type.

Exceptions
ArgumentException ArgumentException

When application name cannot be determined using CodePackageActivationContext.

Remarks

If applicationUri is passed as null, an attempt is made to get application name from CodePackageActivationContext. If the method still cannot determine application name, ArgumentException is thrown.

GetLocalEseStoreConfigSectionName(Type) GetLocalEseStoreConfigSectionName(Type)

Edit

Gets local store configuration section name specified in configuration package for the actor service. 

public static string GetLocalEseStoreConfigSectionName(Type actorImplementationType)Public Shared Function GetLocalEseStoreConfigSectionName(actorImplementationType As Type) As String
Parameters
actorImplementationType
Type Type

Type of class implementing the actor.

Returns
String String

Local store configuration section name.

Remarks

Values specified in local ESE configuration section are used to configure LocalEseStoreSettings for storing the state of actor.

GetName(Type) GetName(Type)

Edit

Gets name of Actor from actorInterfaceType.

public static string GetName(Type actorInterfaceType)Public Shared Function GetName(actorInterfaceType As Type) As String
Parameters
actorInterfaceType
Type Type

Type of the actor interface.

Returns
String String

Name of Actor.
